function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,

onlineCalendar,

);

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225Â°, arm down 90Â° and base swivels 160 Â° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225Â°, the arm can be folded 90Â°, the swivel base can be rotated 160Â° ï¼Œmaking the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.


Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual




*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ã€Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Stationã€‘Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.99 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:03 UTC – Details)



ã€Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Stationã€‘Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13 mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XR/XS MAX/X/8/8Plus & iWatch SE/6/5/4/3/2 & AirPods Pro/3/2/1. A must device for apple fans.
ã€Simplify Charging,Simplified Lifeã€‘Only need one cable to charge for iphone, apple watch and airpods simultaneously, bring you an effortless charging experience, no more tangled cords trouble.Also, easy to find the “sweet spot” to charge, just simply place your phone on the stand and this wireless charger stand will do the rest. The Charging station for multiple devices apple is very suitable as a Christmas gift,Thanksgiving gift or birthday gift for friends.
ã€Intelligent Protection&Sleep Friendly Charging Padã€‘Our wireless charging stand with lightweight design, space saving,base with anti-slip silicone design so that the charger will not move or flip, to ensure that your phone is protected when charging; Besides, features a blue LED indicator when charging. If place this on nightstand, the blue light is a soft and not dazzing, virtually won’t lights up the entire room, no need to worry that it will prevent your sleep from being affected.
ã€What You Will Getã€‘Our package includes 1* Wireless Charger iPhone,1*18W wall adapter,1*USB-C Charging Cable,1*User Manual,Worry-free 24-Month Warranty.One device allows you to have a clean desk and a beautiful smile,Please rest assured of the quality of our products that every product we send to you has gone through a series of quality inspection procedures. if you have any question on this wireless iphone charger, please contact us we will offer you a best solution within 24 hours.

From the brand

HARDELL is a professional tools manufacturer. Whether you are a professional craftsman, a DIY enthusiast, or a modeling enthusiast in need of precision gadgets and miniature tools, HARDELL’s tools can help you.

Mini Cordless Rotary Tool

Rotary Tool Kits

Rotary Tool & Engraver

ã€Multipurpose Rotary Tool Setã€‘The high-performance and low-noise rotary tool combined with 55 most popular power rotary tool accessories for DIY fine work, Not for Heavy-duty Projects. Whenever you think of carving, sanding, grinding, polishing or cutting, you’ll find this electric rotary unit is a must for creating your resin crafts. Owning one is like having a whole toolbox
ã€5-Speed Settingã€‘The cordless rotary tool can realize 5-speed adjustment(5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM),which makes it easier to adjust to a suitable speed to meet the power demand in different scenarios. It allows you to sand in stages safely and carefully. Even people without any experience can easily get started and control the speed easily. Micro rotary tool make your creation handy
ã€Compact Lightweightã€‘Powerful but small and light, just like holding a pen while in use, for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort
ã€Quick USB Charging, Longer Running Timeã€‘Rotary tool cordless comes with 3.7V rechargeable battery, can work continuously for 200 minutes. One charge can be used for multiple times, and the range is stress-free. Battery powered rotary tool make your work one after another. (The indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged)
ã€Rotary Drill with LED Indicatorã€‘The upgraded small cordless rotary tool has a blind spot lighting LED design. Reduce backlight shadows and overcome the adverse effects of dark areas on the use of the drill for resin, and provide you with a better experience


HARDELL MINI Rotary Tool is lightweight and small, you can carry it with you. It is suitable for different DIY working situation

  • Product Featuresï¼š

  1. Cordless design: Cordless design of the rotary tool allows use anywhere without the need for an electrical outlet.
  2. USB Charging: Equipped with a USB power cord, making charging easier and more convenient.
  3. Spindle Lock: Onboard spindle lock makes for quick and easy bit changes.
  4. Variable Speed Tool: With 5 different levels of RPM, which can be adjusted among 5000 to 15000 RPM.
  5. Easy-to-use: You can grip it like a pen for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort. Ergonomic streamlined design with over-load power-off protection for safe and reliable operation.

  • Applicationï¼š

Fit for grinding pet nails and detailed works like sanding, polishing, carving, cutting.

  • Product Contentsï¼š

3.7v Cordless Rotary Tool and 55 Accessories(include USB)


Cordless Rotary Tool with 55 pcs Accessories

What you will get:

  • Cordless Rotary Tool x1
  • Sanding Bands x28
  • Grinding Bits x5+ Diamond Bits x5
  • Collets x6 + Mandrels x2
  • Polishing Wheels x2 + Twist Drill Bit x4 + Cutting Disc x2
  • Accessories Case x2
  • USB Cable x1
Warning

  1. Not for Heavy-duty Projects
  2. Do not press the lock button until the tool fully stops, or it may cause damage or even injury.
  3. Please refer to the instruction manual for a detailed operation guide.

Very useful for arts and crafts projects and small home repairs and are excellent for working in small or hard-to-reach spaces

Specifications

  • 1. Rating: 3.7V
  • 2. 5-Speed: 5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM (no load)
  • 3. Color: Orange
  • 4. Collet Size: 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.4/3.0/3.2mm diameter
  • 5. Charging Port: Micro USB
  • 6. Tool Weight: 0.135kg
  • 7. Tool Size: 3.4*17.5CM

Read more





5 Rotation Speed

5 Rotation Speed controlled, you can make the speed control finely by adjusting the tool to better complete the job.

USB Charging

Rechargeable via supplied compatible USB connector at any place, more convenience for your charging. Full charging time is about 2-4 hours, and the indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged.

Easy to Use

The cordless tool with 7 different sizes compatible collet and spindle lock allows you to quickly and easily change accessories on Rotary tools. (Please make sure the bits are fixed in the rotary tool every time)

Light & Small

Powerful but small and light, like holding a pen when using.

Read more

Installation Instructions


Application




Sanding

Sanding belts and sanding discs can help your handmade crafts become smoother and smooth out the uneven surface of crafts. Such as steel rust, paint and rough wooden boards can be removed by the sanding rotary tool.

Carving

It is very easy to use for accurate DIY craft engraving on glass, wood, metal, plastic, mirrors, and other materials. You can engrave any pattern you like to create a unique gift for your family and friends.

Drilling

This Cordless Rotary Tool can be used for diamond drilling. Different sizes of drill bits and special cutting heads allow you to work easily on wood.

Read more




Polishing

Mini Rotary tools can help you remove rust from some metal surfaces. polishing Wheel and Abrasive Stone are suitable for polishing various materials. Reduce the surface roughness of the product to make its surface bright and flat.

Grinding

You can easily remove rust and polish the metal surface of the object to make the handwork more perfect.

Cutting

Suitable for cutting only light and small projects. Easy to cut plastics, wood, housings, and aluminum brass, etc.

Read more

function getLoadingGifDiv() {

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

From the manufacturer

BELKIN SURGE PROTECTOR

Direct Data Line Protection

* Adding to the 12 surge-protected outlets, the power strip features coaxial protection for your cable or satellite connections.

* With 1-in-2-out RJ11 input where you can directly plug in your telephone or fax machine to secure it against surges and voltage spikes.

Strong Surge Protection

Rated to withstand up to 3,940 joules, this surge suppressor is your premium power protection for your professional workstations, laser printers, broadband modems, and everyday household electronics.

Child Safety Sliding Locks

Each outlet has a sliding safety cover that closes when it is not in use. The covers also prevent dusts and other small particles from entering the socket.

Easily Fits in Different Areas

Equipped with a space-saving flat AC plug for enhanced flexibility and a durable 8 feet cord convenient for hard-to-reach wall receptacles.

Durable and Enduring Build

The Oversized Metal Oxide Varistors (MOVs) absorb excess electricity, and damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust while preventing dents and scratches.

Multi-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip: Power everything on your desk with a single compact surge-protected extension cord. This reputable power cord offers 12 AC outlets with surge protector for charging your computer, laptop, phone, camera, and more. One charging station for a clutter-free desk.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Compact, Heavy Duty, and Space-Saving: The widely spaced outlets give ample area to fit big plugs and charger bricks. Its slender design makes it ideal for home office, workstations, and game rooms. The durable cord is 8 ft / 2.4 meters long with a 3-prong angle plug convenient for tight spaces.

Reliable Product and Service: Purchase with confidence. Check out the full specs: 6,000 volts maximum spike voltage, 15A AC, 125V, and 1875W. Each outlet has a safety slide lock to close unused sockets safeguarding you and your kids.

Multi-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip: Power everything on your desk with a single compact surge-protected extension cord. This reputable power cord offers 12 AC outlets with surge protector for charging your computer, laptop, phone, camera, and more. One charging station for a clutter-free desk.
Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.
Safeguard Your Devices and Appliances: The electric strip has a 3,940-Joule energy rating providing a reliable power extension cord to protect printers, broadband modems, or home theater systems. It secures your electronic devices from overload, short circuit, power spikes, lightning strikes, or fluctuations.
Compact, Heavy Duty, and Space-Saving: The widely spaced outlets give ample area to fit big plugs and charger bricks. Its slender design makes it ideal for home office, workstations, and game rooms. The durable cord is 8 ft / 2.4 meters long with a 3-prong angle plug convenient for tight spaces.
Reliable Product and Service: Purchase with confidence as it is backed by a limited lifetime warranty and protected by a dollar 200,000 Connected Equipment Warranty. Check out the full specs: 6,000 volts maximum spike voltage, 15A AC, 125V, and 1875W. Each outlet has a safety slide lock to close unused sockets safeguarding you and your kids.

8″ HD display, 2X the storage (32 or 64 GB of internal storage and up to 1 TB with microSD card) + 3 GB RAM.
All-day battery life & wireless charging in less than 3 hours with charging dock – Up to 12 hours of reading, browsing the web, watching videos, and listening to music.
Wireless charging dock eliminates the need to plug in your Fire HD 8 Plus every time you want to charge it. The dock is always ready. Just drop your tablet in the dock and let it charge.
30% faster thanks to the new 2.0 GHz quad-core processor.
Enjoy your favorite apps like Netflix, Facebook, Hulu, Instagram, TikTok, and more through Amazonâ€™s Appstore (Google Play not supported), plus 6 months free of Kindle Unlimited (youâ€™ll receive the offer via email upon device activation).
Transform your tablet into an immersive, full-screen Alexa experience, optimized for visibility across the room. Just ask Alexa to show news, check the weather, view camera feeds, make a video call, set alarms, or play your favorite video and music, and much more.
Dock your Fire HD 8 Plus tablet in either portrait or landscape mode, and the cradle helps guide your tablet to ensure proper alignment
